lead_paragraph: The White House is trying to limit the potential political fallout for Democrats of what had become a deep rift in the United States-Israel relationship.

headline.print_headline: White House Mending Fences With Netanyahu
headline.main: White House Seeks to Publicly Mend Fences With Netanyahu, but Issues Remain

snippet: The White House is trying to limit the potential political fallout for Democrats of what had become a deep rift in the United States-Israel relationship.
abstract: Obama administration is attempting to publicly mend fences with Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and show its support for Israel, partly to limit potential political damage for Democrats, as election year approaches, over severe gulf in United States-Israeli relations.
